name: advanced-support-tools
description: Advanced Support Tools Bot is a versatile Discord bot designed to enhance server management with its custom ticket system, integrated payment processing, advanced moderation features, and seamless game integrations, including FiveM. This all-in-one bot allows you to efficiently manage support tickets, handle transactions securely, automate moderation tasks, and integrate in-game events and stats into your server, providing a streamlined and powerful solution for any Discord community.
